name: milk spray-drying | spray-drying of milk | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/11065/documentation

The functional unit is 1 kg water evaporated. This module is based on literature from milk processing equipment manufacturer and should be used when evaluating evaporation of water from evaporated milk to produce milk powder. Basic solid contents are 50% for evaporated milk at input and 96.5% for milk powder at output. Only steam and energy demand for the evaporator are considered. 

From evaporated milk at spray dryer input. 

This activity ends with milk powder at the output of the dryer.
The dataset includes the energy demand (supplied by consumption of electricity and oil) and steam production for evaporating 1 kg of water. 
The dataset does not include waste and emissions to environment (except water from steam to air).
category: C:Manufacturing/10:Manufacture of food products/105:Manufacture of dairy products/1050:Manufacture of dairy products

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Time of publication of the report used for data.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data used are from one European company whose equipment is used worldwide. Uncertainty is adjusted accordingly. ;Quebec specificity for steam production from natural gas is supposed.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Two-stage drying occurs in a spray dryer operated at high temperature (200C) with Vibro-Fluidizer.  ;Spray dryer and fluid bed power consumption are respectively 130 kW and 20 kW. Fuel oil consumption of the spray dryer is 205 kg/h and steam consumption of the fluid bed is 167 kg/h. Evaporator capacity is 3,5 ton of evaporated milk per hour. ;References : ;WESTERGAARD, V. ( 2004). Milk powder technology : evaporation and spray drying. Report for GEA Niro, Danemark. 301 p.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription:
Proxy dataset based on literature from milk processing equipment manufacturer. Only energy demand of dryer and steam production are considered. 
Infrastructure are extrapolated from the "chemical factory, organics" dataset. 
The dataset does not include waste and emissions to environment (except steam to air).

exchanges.description: Functional unit is kg of water evaporated.

flow.name: spray-drying of milk

exchanges.description: Calculated value. Based on reported fuel input (in kg), the Net Heating Value of the fuel and efficiency (1/Fuel_use). It is assumed that used oil is heavy fuel oil.

exchanges.description: Calculated value. All steam is supposed to be rejected to atmosphere.

Proxy value for the infrastructures. Calculation based on the evaporated milk production for the removal of 1kg of water (on a basis of basic solid contents of 50% for input and 3.5% for output, 0.93 kg of water are removed for the production of 1kg of evaporated milk) and the total production of the plant among its lifetime.
